response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth considering a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, I am extending the opportunity to acquire this product for $18,000. This price reflects the true value of the product and includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support. I look forward to discussing how this product could elevate your experience and potentially revolutionize your operations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 18000}
